thread.section_title: TRANSFAST Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TRANSFAST | www.transfast.com | 2 of 119
thread.title: Manish Shakya

author: Manish Shakya
title: Manish Shakya
text: I have been using Transfast for over a year now. They have a good customer service. However, there was a time when it took a while for the person to receive money back home while it was already deducted from my bank account. I believe they might have bugs in their system they have to fix. Other than that, pretty good customer service. Will keep using it in the future.
